channel.title: The Ops Blog
channel.description: Recent content on The Ops Blog

item.title: About Aditya
item.description: Welcome to my website! I am Aditya Krishnakumar, a DevOps Engineer based out of India. I’m mostly into AWS, GCP & Azure Cloud these days and I like to tinker around stuff like testing out new software (I also advocate self-hosting stuff as well), automating certain things from my job, checking out new products and services offered by the mentioned clouds etc. Apart from the major clouds, I also like to hack stuff using Linode as my development platform.
